DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I. Assess toxicity feasibility paclitaxel administration continuous intravenous bcl-2 antisense oligodeoxynucleotide G3139 patient recurrent small cell lung cancer . II . Evaluate clinical response patient population treat regimen . III . Evaluate correlation bcl-2 expression patient efficacy therapy . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord whether receive prior taxane therapy ( yes v ) . Patients receive bcl-2 antisense oligodeoxynucleotide G3139 IV continuously day 1-6 follow 2 week rest . Paclitaxel IV administer 3 hour day 6 course . Treatment continue minimum 2 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Intrapatient dose escalation allow . Patients follow death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 19-33 patient accrue study within 12-18 month .
